name: Detecteur presence
info:
Ce node envoie un message sur la première sortie à chaque fois qu'une présence est détectée, et un timer est alors (re)lancé.
Au bout de la période de timeout ( 60 s par défautl) sans détection de présence, un message est envoyé sur le seconde sortie.

name: Cube
info:
Les sorties possibles sont :

2: tap
3: flip90
4: flip180

name: TOGGLE
ON
Play the SONOS queue - must not be empty - read me
info:
# Play the SONOS queue

## Customizing
- edit `group.play.queue `and select your configuration node.

Ensure that the queue is filled with songs. You can to that either with this package or with the SONOS app.

name: Create a group with 3 Sonos-Player - read me
info:
# Create a group with 3 Sonos-Player
First player is coordinator.

## Customizing
- edit `household.create.group`
    - select any configuration nodee
    - edit payload and enter Sonos-Playernams (not the config node names), seperated by comma but without any blank

name: Test - all players detected - read me
info:
# Test - all players detected

## Use case
check your installation and verify that all players are online.

## Customizing
- edit `household.get.groups`and select your configuration node.

name: Test - what is currently playing - read me
info:
# Test - what is currently playing

## Use case

## Customizing

name: Play Beatles from your Music library - read me
info:
# Play Beatles from your Music library

## Customizing 
- in `household.create.group`
    - select your configuration node.
    - edit payload and enter the name of a beatles album on your music library
